column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came here on a Saturday afternoon with the BF at around 1:45 pm
column2: and was told it would be about a 45 min wait. We put in our orders for our pizza first - we got a medium Chicago Classic. After we got seated
column3: our server recommended the stuffed spinach bread and so we ordered that too. Our pizza and bread didn't take long to arrive.
